title: Online Currency Trading using Digital wallet and cryptocurrency
description: The main goals of the project are to build reliable e-wallet that can load money from both traditional bank accounts and cryptocurrency accounts, an easy-to-use website for safe digital currency trading

title: Market Basket Analysis
description: It entails examining consumer purchasing patterns to find correlations between frequently purchased items.In order to improve sales performance MBA is frequently used in the retail, e-commerce, and marketing industries.

title: Hostel Management System
description: This project is a comprehensive Hostel Management System built using (MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js). This solution is aimed at providing efficient, centralized control over hostel activities enhancing the resident experience.
